metadata.title: Schedule AI - ADHD-friendly AI Schedule Management
metadata.description: An AI-powered schedule management app designed for ADHD. Transform your plans into actionable tasks with intelligent parsing, focus mode, and progress tracking.
metadata.downloadDescription: Download Schedule AI for macOS. Free to use.

hero.description: Transform your natural language plans into structured, actionable tasks. Stay focused with hard blocking, track your progress, and finally get things done.

features.title: Built for focus, designed for ADHD
features.subtitle: Every feature is carefully crafted to help you stay on track and get things done without feeling overwhelmed.

aiParsing.title: AI Plan Parsing
aiParsing.description: Write your plans in natural language. Our AI transforms them into structured, actionable tasks with estimated durations.

hardBlocking.title: Hard Blocking Focus Mode
hardBlocking.description: Block distracting apps completely. When you need to focus, Schedule AI forces you to stay on task by terminating blocked apps.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.description: Visualize your productivity with GitHub-style heatmaps, streak tracking, and daily completion rates.

recurring.title: Recurring Tasks
recurring.description: Set up daily, weekly, or monthly recurring tasks with natural language. 'Every Monday at 9am' just works.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Use Schedule AI in your preferred language. Currently supporting English and Korean with more coming soon.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays on your device. Export and import your data anytime.

footer.tagline: Made with care for the ADHD community.

download.title: Download Schedule AI
download.subtitle: Free to use, designed for ADHD.
download.noRelease: No releases available yet. Check back soon!
download.stepMac1: Download the .dmg file for your Mac
download.stepMac2: Open the .dmg and drag Schedule AI to Applications
download.stepMac3: On first launch, right-click and select "Open" to bypass Gatekeeper
download.stepMac4: Enter your Claude API key in Settings to enable AI features
download.stepWin1: Download the installer (.exe) or MSI package
download.stepWin2: Run the installer and follow the setup wizard
download.stepWin3: Launch Schedule AI from the Start menu
download.stepWin4: Enter your Claude API key in Settings to enable AI features
download.stepLinux1: Download the appropriate package for your distribution
download.stepLinux3: Enter your Claude API key in Settings to enable AI features

showcase.title: Experience Every Feature
showcase.subtitle: Explore how Schedule AI helps you stay focused and productive

today.title: Quick Task Management
today.description: Swipe to complete tasks instantly. No friction, just flow. Add tasks naturally and watch them organize themselves.

focus.title: Hard Blocking Focus Mode
focus.description: When you need to focus, we mean it. Distracting apps are terminated, not just hidden. Pomodoro timer keeps you on track.

plans.title: AI-Powered Planning
plans.description: Write your plans in plain English. Claude AI understands your intent and creates structured, timed tasks automatically.

progress.title: Visual Progress Tracking
progress.description: Your productivity story, visualized. GitHub-style heatmaps show your journey. Streaks keep you motivated.

howItWorks.title: Three Simple Steps
howItWorks.subtitle: From idea to execution in seconds

step1.title: Write
step1.description: Type your plans naturally. No formatting required.

step2.title: Parse
step2.description: AI analyzes and structures your tasks with time estimates.

step3.title: Execute
step3.description: Complete tasks with focus mode support. Track your progress.

adhd.title: Built for ADHD Brains
adhd.subtitle: We understand the struggle. These features are designed specifically for how your brain works.

card1.title: Hard Blocking
card1.description: No willpower needed. Distracting apps are terminated at system level. You literally cannot open them.

card2.title: No Decision Fatigue
card2.description: AI makes the planning decisions for you. Just write what you need to do, we handle the rest.

card3.title: Visual Dopamine
card3.description: Heatmaps and streaks give instant visual rewards. See your progress grow every day.

cta.title: Ready to Take Control?
cta.subtitle: Free to use. No account required. Your data stays on your device.
